# Firmly Docs

This file provides guidance for Large Language Models (LLMs) on navigating and understanding the content available on the Firmly documentation site (https://docs.firmly.ai). Use the file at https://docs.firmly.ai/llms-full.txt for a single file with all the content embedded.

- [Firmly-api / Firmly-cart-api / Add-item-to-cart](https://docs.firmly.ai/firmly-api/firmly-cart-api/add-item-to-cart/index.md)
